divs: Sighting DetailsHi, I guess the video is worth posting for a few reasons: you can see how clear the day is, the distance I would now lower my estimate to under a mile...that ridge is the saddle between Armer and Carr peaks in the Sierra Anches). The object is behind the third pine tree to the left from the right edge. You can clearly see the unnatural sparkle behind that tree. Those pines are an average of about 60' tall on that ridge. The area used to be mined for uranium in the late 1800's and is between two National Wildernesses. the file name is "vanished" because at the time I thought I missed it on film, those viewfinder screens are not easy in open sunlight.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Miami
